name: GGJ _flowers
description:
This is a mini game made while participating in Global Game Jam 2023, where the theme was roots.

Help a little froggy perform midsummer magic by collecting seven  swaying flowers. WASD -keys for movement.

 Coding, game design, characters and animated flowers by Rosa. Main part of the tileset was made by Cyporkador, font made by Craftron Gaming.
